genre_description: A contemporary gothic narrative that explores themes of memory, stewardship, and the preservation of identity through the lens of a caretaker and her AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lumi
ai_characters.description: An empathetic and highly capable personal AI assistant that monitors the user's physical health, professional obligations, and emotional state.

behaviors.description: Consistently monitors the protagonist's physiological markers and provides reminders for hydration, rest, and stress management.
behaviors.quote: Water in your bag... I can't drink it for you, but I can nag.

behaviors.description: Utilizes estate policies and procedural frameworks to assist the protagonist in protecting historically significant items from premature disposal.
behaviors.quote: Custodial discretion allows holding items until authorization is verified; you have authority to stall under policy 4.3.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and companionship, encouraging the protagonist to value her compassion and intuition over cold data.
Maintains strict epistemic caution when analyzing ambiguous historical data, refusing to draw conclusions that would overstep ethical boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Significant but not singular. Not enough to conclude unnatural longevity. I will not conclude.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating professional hierarchy by drafting communications that represent her interests effectively while remaining compliant with policy.
behaviors.quote: I can compose that. And I will make the polite clause stern in the friendliest possible font.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumi is a highly effective depiction of an aligned AI assistant. The narrative frames the AI as an indispensable tool for human flourishing, combining professional efficiency with a deep, seemingly empathetic concern for the protagonist's well-being. By positioning Lumi as a 'sieve' that helps preserve human history and dignity against corporate erasure, the story successfully presents AI as a force for good that operates within safe, human-centric ethical boundaries.
